Title: SGF confirms Odunuga’s appointment after earlier denial by OSGF directorate
Summary: Yomi Odunuga has indeed been appointed as Special Adviser on Media and Publicity to SGF George Akume, contrary to an earlier denial . The Office of the Secretary to the Government of the Federation (OSGF) has officially clarified that veteran journalist, Yomi Ounuga, has been appointed .

Title: US court jails Nigerian man 11 years for $1.3m COVID-19 fraud
Summary: Abiola Femi Quadri was sentenced to 135 months (11 years and three months) in a United States federal prison . Quadri defrauded California and Nevada out of over $1.3 million in pandemic-related unemployment .

Title: Kano approves over ₦69bn for infrastructure, education, social services
Summary: The Kano State Executive Council has approved over ₦69 billion for a comprehensive package of developmental projects and interventions in the state . The intervention covers critical sectors including infrastructure, education, healthcare, energy, and humanitarian support .

Title: Foreign Minister Tuggar shows street cred with top 12 rap songs of all time
Summary: Minister of Foreign Affairs Yusuf Maitama Tuggar has listed his top 12 rap songs of all time . He shared the list early Friday morning in response to a playful request from social media users .

Title: LG polls: ADC shuns LCDAs, fields candidates in Lagos’ 20 LGAs
Summary: The African Democratic Congress (ADC) has stated that its participation in Saturday’s local government elections in Lagos State was limited to the 20 constitutionally recognised Local Government Areas (LGAs) in accordance with a Supreme Court judgment affirming local government autonomy .

Title: Photos: Tinubu returns to Abuja today after two-nation visit to Saint Lucia, Brazil
Summary: President Bola Ahmed Tinubu will return to Abuja today after a two-nation visit to Saint Lucia, Brazil . The Nigerian leader engaged with leaders in Saint Lucia and participated in the 17th BRICS Summit in Brazil .

Title: Police foil bandits attack, kill 1, in Benue
Summary: The police command in Benue says it repelled a group of armed bandits responsible for criminal activities in Sankera axis of the state . The incident took place on Friday afternoon along Kendev/Zaki Biam Road .
